title: Pistons vs. Hornets
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 9 at 7:00PM ET:
If the Pistons win, the market will resolve to "Pistons".
If the Hornets win, the market will resolve to "Hornets".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
The result will be determined based on the final score including any overtime periods.

markets.question: Spread: Pistons (-3.5)
markets.description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 9 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Pistons" if the Pistons win the game by 4 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Hornets". If the game ends in a tie, this market will resolve to "Hornets".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Pistons vs. Hornets: O/U 224.5
markets.description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 9 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Pistons and Hornets combine to score 225 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 225, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Cade Cunningham: Points O/U 24.5
markets.description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 9 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Cade Cunningham scores more than 24.5 points during the game.

This market will resolve to "No" if Cade Cunningham scores 24.5 points or fewer during the game.

The entire game including all overtime periods will be considered.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
